title: I want a male Star Guardian skin.
body:
Just for the lolz of it. Or even better, make it two: one who totally hates the outfit, and another who totally ROCKS it.

I know I have seen art of Gragas, Braum, Urgot, etc, but let's be real here: that body type is not fitting the aesthetic. So instead of the big buff bara men (and the cyborg) we should look at these champs: 

{{champion:119}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:4}} 

I mean, we have now three human women, two yordles, so having one or two men in the group surely can't hurt ^^

Although... Taric technically already is a Guardian. And he is already fab as fuck (especially with the pink skin), so maybe he shouldn't be on the list ^^

replies.body:
Well I already have his pink skin, but if that one would turn out to be even MORE outragous...

(Is that even possible? I do not even dare to think about it...)

you're walking into uncharted territory watch yourself, those gems may be too much to handle.

(time to pray for this soul)
Power Ranger line for guys, LOL

Hey the Power Rangers also had a female member, so the Star Guardians can have a man backing them up ^^

I wouldn't oppose such a skinline tho ^^

>I mean, we have now four human women, two yordles, 

Sorry what... there's only 5 skins... something doesn't add up here XD
woops, three women . my brain is not working well at 4 AM... I fixed it, thanks for pointing it out!

Tbh I would consider almost all of those you suggested to be a bit bara (Taric a lot), except Ekko and Ezreal.  
You could have Star Guardian Rumble and Star Guardian Garen, I can see those two since Garen could be in an older division than Lux, and would tie them in biologically as being destined to be Star Guardians. The rest I don't see fitting the thematic.

Draven fits into EVERY thematic. That man's a hyperprofessional entertainer with ultimative narcissm. 

Ezreal and Ekko are both young guys and would fit into the age range of most typical "magical girl" shows.

About the others... well I'm sure technically it could work. ^^ Also Jayce only appears that big because of his shoulder pads in his outfit. That guy is more brains than brawns after all ^^
